TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TableCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: The data to retrieve from the provider.
Docs.summary: References the method to call when retrieving table data from a provider.

remarks.format:
## Remarks When a Web Parts control implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartTable> interface and serves as a provider in a Web Parts connection, the consumer or transformer must retrieve and process the table data from the provider. The TableCallback delegate represents the method to call for processing the provider data.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartTable.GetTableData%2A> method contains a TableCallback delegate parameter.
## Examples The following code example contains a Web Parts control named `TableProviderWebPart` that serves as a provider of data in the form of a table. The control includes an implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartTable.GetTableData%2A> method, which receives a parameter of type TableCallback. This method calls the method represented by the TableCallback delegate passing the table data.
[!code-vb[WebParts_TableCallback_Overview#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.web.ui.webcontr_183_1.vb)] [!code-cs[WebParts_TableCallback_Overview#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.web.ui.webcontr_183_1.cs)]
In the `OnPreRender` method, the consumer calls `GetTableData` in `TableProviderWebPart` and passes its `GetTableData` method as the delegate to call with the table data, as shown in the following code example.
[!code-cs[WebParts_TableCallback_Overview#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.web.ui.webcontr_183_2.cs)] [!code-vb[WebParts_TableCallback_Overview#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.web.ui.webcontr_183_2.vb)]
The two controls and the connection are included in a Web page, as shown in the following example.
[!code-cs[WebParts_TableCallback_Overview#3](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.web.ui.webcontr_183_3.aspx)] [!code-vb[WebParts_TableCallback_Overview#3](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.web.ui.webcontr_183_3.aspx)]
